DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Deposits Contact Lenses Worn Daily Wear
DOC.criteria: 18 year old . Visual acuity correctable 20/30 ( Snellen ) good eye distance contact lenses . Successfully wear hydrogel silicone hydrogel contact lenses prior enrollment study . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Evidence history keratitis ( dendritic keratitis ) ; viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; acute bacterial disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid ; infection eye ; and/or fungal disease eye . One functional eye monofit lens . Ocular condition active acute blepharitis , conjunctival infection , iritis . Any slitlamp finding score ( 1 ) Screening Visit define protocol . Use concomitant topical ocular prescription overthecounter ( OTC ) ocular medication . History seasonal allergy significant ocular side effect may adverse impact contact lens wear . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
